content: Welcome to Yafeng Yin's Homepage Yafeng Yin 殷亚凤 PhD, Assistant Professor, Gusu Young Professor, Ph.D. Advisor State Key Laboratory for Novel Software Technology, School of Intelligent Software and Engineering, Nanjing University, China Email: yafeng AT nju.edu.cn Office: Room 225, East of Nanyong Building, Suzhou Campus [Short Biography] [Research Interest] [Projects] [Teaching] [Publications] [Selected Awards] [Students] [Team/Group] Short Biography I am an assistant professor of School of Intelligent Software and Engineering at Nanjing University. I received my Ph.D. degree from Nanjing University in 2017 under the supervision of Prof. Sanglu Lu and Prof. Lei Xie, and received my BE degree from Nanjing University of Science and Technology in 2011. From Sep. 2014 to Sep. 2015, I was a visiting research scholar in Department of Computer Science at the College of William and Mary, supervised by Prof. Qun Li and sponsored in part by China Scholarship Council (CSC). From Jul. 2017 to Jun. 2023, I was an assistant, associate researcher in Department of Computer Science and Technology at Nanjing University. Research Interest My research interests focus on Intelligent Sensing and Visual Computing, including multimodal sensing and learning, human activity recognition, sign language translation and generation. I am recruiting motivated Ph.D. or master students who would like to work on the above-mentioned areas. Undergraduate students who are interested in the related topics are also encouraged to contact me.
